text: "Check My Brain" is a 2009 song by Alice in Chains. It is the leading single from their fourth studio album Black Gives Way to Blue. It went to number 92 in the United States, number 62 in Canada and number 1 on the Billboard Hot Rock & Alternative Songs chart. It was nominated for a Grammy Award in 2010. ==References== Category:2009 songs Category:Alice in Chains songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: Check My Brain
